author: Anthony Buice

review: I bought this on a recommendation from a friend who loves theirs, unfortunately I can't say the same.  Mine stalls a lot then the words being said stop matching the movements of the people's mouths.  After that happens and you restart it a couple times, it looses sounds completely. I have borrowed said friends to see if it was something other than the Chromecast itself, however that one worked fine.  If I leave mine unplugged until I need to use it, it works better (it gets really hot when I don't and the problems tend to be a lot worse).  Sometimes I can watch a whole movie straight through which is why I gave this 3 stars; when it works, it's great but when it doesn't, it's supremely frustrating.  Evidently mine is just a lemon.  I've thought about just tossing the one I have and trying again but I've seen a lot of reviews with the same problems I've had and don't want to waste anymore of my money.
